Name: Speed And Survive Ball, 速度与幸存之球
About the game: What kind of work is this? You help a small ball to avoid the game of deadly squares from around. The small ball needs speed to survive. Please help it. Control method: Up, down, left and right, enter, ESC Characteristic: 1. This is a game that takes only a short time for each game. 2. It's a game that tests concentration. 3. This is a small ball running to survive. 4. This is an action game to test and strengthen your emergency response. 5. It's a game with a little bit of strategy. This is a 2-person small team product. I hope you can like it and put forward suggestions for improvement. If you can add it in the next version. Update: Update: March 3, 2020 　　　　UI optimization, from text to pictures, add a little expressiveness and beauty! Update:March 31, 2020 　　　　add other platforms, 　　　　Google Play : name 'SpeedAndSurvive' 　　　　　　( ) 　　　　Ios : name 'Speed And Survive Ball,速度与幸存之球' Update:April 4, 2020 　　　　Add leaderboard
